note.name: Note to Readers

t.em: RFC EDITOR: please remove this section before publication

note.t: Discussion of this draft takes place on the HTTP working group mailing list (ietf-http-wg@w3.org), which is archived at https://lists.w3.org/Archives/Public/ietf-http-wg/.
The source code and issues list for this draft can be found at https://github.com/ioggstream/draft-polli-service-description-well-known-uri.
